Address.label: Address
Address.value: CBAK INDUSTRIAL PARK, NO. 11 MEIGUI STREET (EAST),HUAYUANKOU ECONOMIC ZONE, DALIAN, 116450, China

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: CBAK Energy Technology Inc is engaged in the manufacture, commercialization, and distribution of a variety of standard and customized lithium-ion high power rechargeable batteries which are mainly used in electric vehicles, light electric vehicles, electric tools, energy storage, uninterruptible power supply, and other high power applications. The company manufactures five types of Li-ion rechargeable batteries namely aluminum-case cell, battery pack, cylindrical cell, lithium polymer cell, and high-power lithium battery cell. Geographically, it generates a majority of its revenue from Mainland China and also has an operation in Europe, the United States, Korea, and Other Countries.
